person.persName: Mordecai J. W. Ambrose (Bourbon County, Kentucky, Methodist minister, physician and chaplain 7th Ky Cav USA)

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, minister, physician, and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Mordecai Ambrose and Mahala Sargent Ambrose. Married to Sophia F. Patton Ambrose. Father of Mary Viola Ambrose, France Phila J. Ambrose, Harrison J. Ambrose, Thomas H. Ambrose, and L. D. Ambrose. Physician in Fleming County, Kentucky, in 1850. Methodist minister in Bourbon County in 1860. Served in the 7th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as chaplain from August 17, 1862, to July 10, 1865.
